sentence.Network_en: He didn't realize what a gaucherie he'd made.
sentence.Network_cn: 他没意识到自己的笨拙举动。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以g开头的英语英文单词 ... gauche 笨拙的，不会社交的 gaucherie 笨拙 gaudy 俗丽的.
gauche 粗鲁的gaucherie 粗鲁上一篇：
英文词章（单词部分） - 豆丁网 ... emulate 与…竞争, 努力赶上 gaucherie 笨拙 2 笨拙举动 precept 规诫, 戒律, 箴言.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: French, from gauche (see gauche)

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being rustic or gauche
2. a socially awkward or tactless act

auth_sentence.content: Whitman uses rhyme...with some awkwardness or, as he would have put it, gaucherie.
auth_sentence.res_content: Whitman uses rhyme...with some awkwardness or, as he would have put it, gaucherie.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Whitman uses rhyme...with some awkwardness or, as he would have put it, gaucherie.
